controls: Drive: W / A / S / D or arrow keysDrift: CNitro: ShiftJump: SpaceSpin‑flip: double‑tap S or down arrowShoot cannon: E (after you grab one)Pause: Esc
content.howToPlay: Pick a mode. Want nonstop wrecks? Hop into Death Match. Craving laps? Try Racing. Need chill time? Freedrive lets you roam and practice tricks.Drive over floating cannons to bolt a turret to your roof, or snag green healing kits to glue fallen blocks back in place.Drifting corners or landing a 360º flip mid‑air repairs damage and fills your boost bar, so show off.Win, earn coins, unlock more rides. Each victory feeds your garage. Collect muscle cars and even a blocky school bus. And if you replace tires with giant ones, you can turn any vehicle in your garage into a monster truck.
content.tips: Drift on purpose. A quick tap of C around every corner keeps your health topped and fills nitro for the next straightaway.Mid‑air spins matter. Double‑press S just before a jump; a donut drift not only looks cool but can fully repair your car.Soccer tricks. In football mode, ramming the ball with nitro gives it extra lift, which is perfect for top‑corner shots.Survival smarts. Hide behind wrecks until only a few cars remain, then grab a cannon and finish the job.Map memory. Healing kits respawn at fixed spots. Learn the locations and loop through them like a health circuit.
content.developer: Carnage Battle Arena is built by BoomBit S.A.

fullContent: Home› CrashCarnage Battle ArenaBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenBuckle up and play Carnage Battle Arena online! This free browser game turns every fender‑bender into a shower of Lego‑style blocks. Pick one of 80‑plus rideable bricks, dive onto wild maps, and smack into rivals until their bumpers scatter across the asphalt. Each ding knocks parts clean off your car. Just as you used to play with your Lego cars when you were a kid. But here, a quick drift, mid‑air spin, a cool stunt, or a healing kit will snap those blocks right back on.With league shows, stadium soccer rounds, open‑world freedrive, classic lap races, survival showdowns, and high‑score hunts, there's always a new reason to floor it after school.
